entry.title: AllPlayers Kick-Awesome Podcast #2 - DrupalCon Devner Wrap-Up
entry.content:
Join Chris, Max, David, James and Allan from AllPlayers as they talk about the latest drupal news, how we planned to plan, and much more!

Get it while it's hot!

AllPlayers Kick-Awesome Podcast #2 - DrupalCon Devner Wrap-Up

entry.title: AllPlayers Kick-Awesome Podcast #1 - Planning To Plan
entry.content:
So we finally did it! We started a podcast. Join Chris, Max, Travis, David, James and Allan from AllPlayers as they talk about the latest drupal news, how we planned to plan, and much more!

Get it while it's hot!

AllPlayers Kick Awesome Podcast #1 - Planning to Plan
